summary: Provides an end‑to‑end test suite that writes simulation log data in various formats (categorical values, fixed and variable length lists, dictionary rows, plain strings) and then reads it back, checking that the logging system correctly persists and restores the information across different data representations and serialization mechanisms.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the simulation logging infrastructure so that downstream analysis and reproducibility are not compromised by data loss or format incompatibilities.
